entity.name: The US and the Taliban sign a peace agreement to end 18-year conflict in Afghanistan
entity.description: In a ceremony in Doha, Qatar, US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and Taliban leaders came together for a deal which is expected to pave the way towards peace in Afghanistan.

text: @realDonaldTrump The Taliban have punked you. You’ve shown no leadership. Go hug a coronavirus patient, grifter.
